title: You ain't alone
content:
Let every ache dissolve before the morning dew.
You're not alone — many would've met, if not for the flu.
So toss some dry fruits in with the things you chew,
You're braver, kinder, stronger than you ever knew.

title: Life
content:
ಓ ಮನವೆ ಏಕೆ ಆತುರದಿ ಓಡುತಿರುವೆ ನಾ ಕಾಣಿ
ಹಿಡಿಯಲ್ ಹೋಗ್ಬ್ಯಾಡ ಈ ಜೀವನದ ಮುಂಚಾಣಿ
ಹಿಡಿದ್ರು ಹುಡಕ್ಬ್ಯಾಡ ಆ ಸುಖ-ಸಂಪತ್ತಿನ ಗಣಿ
ತ್ರಾಸ ಆದ್ಮ್ಯಾಲ್ ಮನಸ್ತಾಪ ಮಾಡ್ಕೊಂತಿ ನನ್ಮೇಲಾಣಿ

title: Just like a pair of shoes!
content:
That warmth I feel with you,
It's so beautiful as those drops of dew.
It feels like we are bonded with that warmth glue.
And when I'm with you time flies without a clue!

With you, happiness arrives out of blue.
May be it's the feelings which are strong and true.
We are not alike but perfect when together like a pair of shoes..
so many ascends and descends to be travelled as a pair are due!

title: You are born to fly!
content:
You're not bound by any chains.
Don't worry about the people who think of their gains.
Come out of fear, it's hard but give a try.
Oh dear, remember that you're born to fly!

It's time to step up, because it's your reign.
Strong blood runs through your veins.
Don't limit yourself, dream as high as sky.
Oh dear, remember that you're born to fly!

Someday I wish to see you above the rains.
Breaking through & making your own lanes.
Your happiness being all time high.
Oh dear, don't forget that you're born to fly!
